attributes.additional_details: It is medically proven that regular physical activity helps improve your overall health, fitness, and quality of life. It also helps reduce your risk of chronic conditions like type 2 diabetes, heart disease, many types of cancer, depression and anxiety. Leaving these facilities open will also help aid the governments plan on “tackling obesity: empowering adults and children to live healthier lives” as some people do not not to exercise outside and prefer gyms as a means of keeping fit.
attributes.background: Allow gyms to reopen during the national lockdown to allow people to escape and help maintain good mental and physical health.
